item.title: Building Go projects using modules on Jenkins
item.description: The Go 1.11 release introduced experimental, opt-in support for Go modules. It is now possible to build Go projects outside of the $GOPATH. This profound change has a significant impact on developer workflows. For example, you don’t have to set up the expected directory structure anymore just because you want to fix a simple bug in an open source package. Furthermore, CI processes can clone the code and run the Go command directly from the checkout directory.
